verses.name: Genesis 2:1
verses.text: Thus the heavens and the earth were finished, and all the host of them.

verses.name: Genesis 2:2
verses.text: And on the seventh day God ended his work which he had made; and he rested on the seventh day from all his work which he had made.

verses.name: Genesis 2:3
verses.text: And God blessed the seventh day, and sanctified it: because that in it he had rested from all his work which God created and made.

verses.name: Genesis 2:4
verses.text: These are the generations of the heavens and of the earth when they were created, in the day that the Lord God made the earth and the heavens,
